P

processRequest(UriInfo, AsyncResponse, Function<CaravanRhyme, T>, Function<T, ? extends LinkableResource>) - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.caravan.api.CaravanRhymeRequestCycle
Handles the full request cycle: Create a CaravanRhyme instance Pass that instance on to the given function to create a request context instance Pass that context on to the given function to create the resource implementation to be rendered Render the resource using the JaxRsAsyncHalResponseRenderer service Catch and handle any exceptions that are thrown in the previous steps

Render a response for an exception that was caught before a LinkableResource was created

S
